title: Surface Laptop
content:
{{Short description|Line of laptops developed by Microsoft running Microsoft Windows operating system}}
[[File:Microsoft Surface logo.svg|220px|right]]
{{surface models}}
The '''Surface Laptop''' is a line of laptops marketed by [[Microsoft]], as a sub-brand of their [[Microsoft Surface|Surface]] devices. Several models have been produced:
* [[Surface Laptop (1st generation)]], released in 2017
* [[Surface Laptop 2]], released in 2018
* [[Surface Laptop 3]], released in 2019
* [[Surface Laptop 4]], released in 2021
* [[Surface Laptop 5]], released in 2022
* [[Surface Laptop 6]], released in April 2024
* [[Surface Laptop 7th Edition]], released in June 2024 (first release with the [[List_of_Qualcomm_Snapdragon_systems_on_chips#Snapdragon_X_series|Qualcomm Snapdragon X]] [[ARM architecture family|ARM]] CPUs)
* [[Surface Laptop Go]], marketed as an affordable version of the Surface Laptop, released in 2020
* [[Surface Laptop Studio]], a 2-in-1 version of the Surface Laptop, released in 2021
*[[Surface Laptop SE]], an education-oriented version of the Surface Laptop, shipping with [[Windows 11|Windows 11 SE]], released in 2021

[[Category:Surface Laptop| ]]
[[Category:Computer-related introductions in 2017]]
